name: Masterpieces for Miserable Memories
description:
A very short 2-3 minute game where you walk inside the mind of someone that ruined their life for fame.

This project was made during the Fall and Winter of 2021 as a final for my Level Design class and the process for development due to having never used Unreal Engine before took about twelve weeks. Usually, I work with very goofy cartoony things, so I wanted to be able to show people what else I could make. Two of my main goals during my studies were:
1. Have it be a very simple idea due to being unfamiliar with the software and game design in general.
2. Try to use the least amount of assets possible without it looking super cheap and strange.

This will probably not be updated often or at all, but I'm keeping it as a prototype because I feel like adding onto it someday would be nice, and in the future, I'm sure I could implement the ideas in this much better.
I hope you enjoy!

You can find me through @AnAnomalySpeaks on Twitter or Instagram to see what else I'm usually working on.
